descriptionHtml:
[size=10][b][color=black][center] Prastian [/size][/b][/color][/center]

[size=5][b]Core[/size][/b]

[size=3][b]
-Prastian are guild who hunt daedra and creatures, they worship Tiber septim as their god,
 They Became Business partners with nightingale and thieves. But they made a 1 mistake that they regret, That\'s why they Forget everything what happen About them

-Prastian are now gone since dawnguard has come , but Mislaya is the only one left on prastian. 
Now Mislaya do not trust anyone except the DOVAHKIIN.
[/size][/b] 

[size=5][b][center] Description[/size][/b][/center]

[size=3][b]
- This mod adds a 1 follower and items .
- These are the list of items 
[/size][/b]

[size=5][b][center] Follower[/size][/b][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1172.photobucket.com/albums/r569/davidjohn1234/686d2097.png[/IMG][/center]
[size=5][b][center]Mislaya[/center][/size][/b]
[size=3][b]- Female
- Age 18
- Stays At Wind Peak inn
- One-Handed Trainer
- Dual Wield (does not support ranged and magic)
- Know Disarm shout (taught by his 1st leader Rengar)
- Marriageable
- 2nd leader of Prastian
( if You Want to look like her on screenshot , Used [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]Univision Face[/url]
[/size][/b]
[size=5][b][center] Items:[/size][/b][/center]

[size=3][b]
~Prastian Set~
- Prastian Armor
- Prastian Boots
- Prastian Gloves
- Prastian Hood

- (ALL light version , ill add heavy version on the next patch :))

- Prastian Ring
- Prastian Sword
- Prastian Greatsword
[/size][/b]

[size=5][b][center] Location [/size][/b][/center]
[size=3][b]
- Prastian Set Can be found on Prastian lair near dawnstar mine (just look on the screenshot)
- Prastian Weapons Can be craft ( Requires Steel Smithing)
[/size][/b]

[size=4][b][center] Requires Higher Patch of skyrim[/center] [/size][/b]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][b]
 Ill try to add these followings on the next update:
- Heavy and light version
- More members of prastian
- More items
- Spells
- Homes

~~ If You do Find a bug please tell me :)

-- This is my fifth mod .. Cheers XD

-- Credits to Bethesda/Creation kit
[/size][/b]
author: Abram1

files.name: Prastian v1
files.changelogHtml:
added a light version.
added prastian items and mislaya
